segments.text: Where do you wish me to take you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please take us to Harvard University . By the way , is it far from here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It takes about half an hour to get there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( Get here ) Here we are , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do I owe you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s 35 dollars on the meter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here ’ s 50 dollars . Keep the change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S2
